column1: '''Gárulf''' was a Man of [[Rohan]] during the [[War of the Ring]].
Gárulf was a rider in the ''[[Éored]]'' of [[Éomer]], [[Third Marshal of the Riddermark]]. His ''Éored'' [[Ambush at Fangorn Forest‎
column2: attacked and slaughtered]] the [[Uruk-hai]] of [[Uglúk]] under the eaves of [[Fangorn Forest]], where Gárulf was killed. His horse [[Hasufel]] was given to [[Aragorn]] by Éomer when they first met in [[the Wold]].<ref>{{TT

column1: ''Gárulf'' is [[Old English]] for "spear-wolf". It was a name of a jutish warrior in the ''[[Beowulf and the Finnsburg Fragment
